# tcdkhelper

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tcdkhelper is to facilitate data science tasks at Testcenter Danmark

## Installation

You can install the development version of tcdkhelper from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Testcenter-Danmark/tcdkhelper")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows how to fetch data from the database:

```{r example}
library(tcdkhelper)

data <- get_query("Select top (100) 
          MatrixPlateBC
          ,DWPlateBC
          ,RTimestampPM
          from Plateflow_Biomek
          Order by RTimestampPM desc")
```
